publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1106 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Management of Offenders etc. (Scotland) Act 2005 (Members’ Remuneration and Supplementary Provisions) Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Management of Offenders etc. (Scotland) Act 2005 (Members’ Remuneration and Supplementary Provisions) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-1106 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Management of Offenders etc. (Scotland) Act 2005 (Members’ Remuneration and Supplementary Provisions) Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Management of Offenders etc. (Scotland) Act 2005 (Members’ Remuneration and Supplementary Provisions) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
